description: Kuhl’s exclusive Reflex™ fabric brings its new level of comfort and performance to the Men’s Silencr™ Pant. Lightweight, durable, and equipped with plenty of stretch, these water and sun resistant (UPF 50) pants will thrive whether on the trail or at the office.
name: Kuhl Silencr Pants, 34" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: two front hand, one coin, two back, two stealth cell phone pocket
